Based between New York and Lithuania, The Knotty Ones was founded by three best friends who set out to design the perfect knit while empowering less privileged women in their community. The Knotty Ones supports independent female artisans as well as female-founded factories in rural Lithuania to create the knitwear, providing them with financial independence and a voice in their households and communities. Our Barbora knit was inspired by its namesake: Barbora RadvilaitÄ, Grand Duchess of Lithuania. Cozy-soft yet structured, she's a knit filled with contrasts, right down to the grey and off-white stitching that cascades down her sleeves. Much like the real Barbora, she's ready to tackle whatever comes her way, whether that's a bittersweet love story or a seriously cold winter day. 100% wool. Hand wash. Import. Online only. Item N7441. Shipping & Returns
